text: It is not enough to say we must not wage war. It is necessary to love peace and sacrifice for it.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

text: Where ignorance is our master, there is no possibility of real peace.
author: Dalai Lama

text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

text: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
author: Buddha

text: Avoid popularity if you would have peace.
author: Abraham Lincoln
